title: WHAT ARE VERSATURF TIRES? WHAT ARE R14 TIRES? WHAT MAKES THEM BETTER? #tractor

tasks.task: Operate and maintain hybrid tractor tires
subtasks: Identify the characteristics of hybrid tires
Differentiate between R1, R3, R4 tire types
Understand the combination of turf, ag, and industrial tire properties
Recognize VersaTurf and R14 tire models
Note availability for subcompact and small compact tractors
Identify manufacturers offering premium hybrid tires
Recommend purchasing options for new tractors (e.g., Summit TX25)
Find alternative tire providers for retrofitting (e.g., industrial tire shops)
Source tires through online retailers (e.g., Amazon)
Assess the performance benefits of hybrid tires (optimal traction, tread life, versatility)
Evaluate suitable terrains for hybrid tires (off-road, dirt, woods, snow, ice)
